name: Porridge de avena con frutos rojos y semillas
ingredients: Avena (70g), Leche de almendras (200ml), Frambuesas (80g), Arándanos (50g), Semillas de chía (15g), Almendras fileteadas (20g), Miel de agave (15g)

name: Tostadas con hummus y aguacate
ingredients: Pan integral (80g), Hummus (80g), Aguacate (70g), Tomate (50g), Semillas de sésamo (10g), Aceite de oliva (5g), Limón (10g)

name: Tortilla de garbanzos con espinacas
ingredients: Harina de garbanzos (60g), Agua (100ml), Espinacas (100g), Cebolla (50g), Pimiento rojo (50g), Aceite de oliva (15g), Cúrcuma (3g)

name: Yogur vegano con granola y frutos secos
ingredients: Yogur de soja (150g), Granola vegana (50g), Nueces (20g), Almendras (15g), Arándanos deshidratados (20g), Semillas de calabaza (10g)

name: Chili vegano con quinoa
ingredients: Alubias rojas (150g), Garbanzos (100g), Quinoa (100g), Tomate triturado (200g), Maíz (80g), Cebolla (50g), Comino (5g), Pimentón (3g), Aceite de oliva (15g)

name: Pasta alla rustica vegana
ingredients: Pasta integral (120g), Tomates cherry (150g), Berenjena (100g), Calabacín (80g), Aceitunas negras (30g), Albahaca fresca (20g), Queso vegano (60g), Aceite de oliva (20g)

name: Albóndigas de alubias blancas con salsa de cebolla

name: Black veggie burger con patatas
ingredients: Hamburguesa de lentejas (180g), Pan de burger integral (80g), Lechuga (50g), Tomate (50g), Cebolla (30g), Patatas asadas (200g), Salsa vegana (30g), Aguacate (40g)

name: Quinua con verduras y tofu
ingredients: Quinoa (120g), Tofu firme (150g), Brócoli (100g), Zanahoria (80g), Pimiento rojo (80g), Salsa de soja (20ml), Aceite de sésamo (10g), Semillas de sésamo (10g)

name: Curry de patatas y garbanzos
ingredients: Patatas (200g), Garbanzos (150g), Leche de coco light (100ml), Cebolla (50g), Espinacas (100g), Curry en polvo (10g), Arroz basmati (100g), Aceite de oliva (15g)

name: Sopa reconfortante de tomate y garbanzos
ingredients: Tomate (300g), Garbanzos (120g), Cebolla (50g), Ajo (10g), Albahaca fresca (15g), Pan integral (60g), Aceite de oliva (15g), Caldo vegetal (300ml)

name: Ensalada César vegana
ingredients: Lechuga romana (150g), Pollo vegetal (120g), Salsa César vegana (60g), Picatostes integrales (40g), Queso parmesano vegano (30g), Semillas de girasol (15g)

name: Tortilla de patatas con harina de garbanzos
ingredients: Patatas (250g), Harina de garbanzos (80g), Agua (150ml), Cebolla (100g), Cúrcuma (5g), Sal negra (3g), Aceite de oliva (20g), Espinacas (50g)

name: Empanada de no-atún con pisto
ingredients: Masa de empanada vegana (150g), Atún vegetal (150g), Calabacín (100g), Berenjena (80g), Pimiento rojo (80g), Cebolla (50g), Aceitunas (30g), Aceite de oliva (20g)

name: Stroganoff vegano con seitán
ingredients: Seitán (200g), Champiñones (150g), Cebolla (50g), Leche de soja (100ml), Mostaza (10g), Arroz integral (120g), Perejil fresco (10g), Aceite de oliva (15g)

name: Milanesas de avena y semillas
ingredients: Milanesa de avena (180g), Pan rallado integral (40g), Semillas de lino (20g), Semillas de sésamo (15g), Puré de patatas (200g), Ensalada verde (100g), Aceite de oliva (20g)

name: Hummus con crudités
ingredients: Garbanzos cocidos (150g), Tahini (25g), Aceite de oliva (15g), Zanahoria (150g), Pepino (100g), Pimiento (100g), Limón (20g), Comino (3g)

name: Bolas energéticas de dátiles y coco
ingredients: Dátiles (120g), Almendras (50g), Coco rallado (40g), Avena (50g), Semillas de chía (15g), Cacao en polvo (10g), Esencia de vainilla (3g)

name: Yogur vegano con frutos rojos y semillas
ingredients: Yogur de soja (200g), Fresas (80g), Frambuesas (60g), Semillas de chía (10g), Semillas de granada (20g), Miel de agave (15g)

name: Bizcocho de zanahoria y nueces

name: Batido verde proteico

name: Tostas de aguacate y tomate
ingredients: Pan integral (80g), Aguacate (100g), Tomate (100g), Semillas de sésamo (10g), Aceite de oliva (10g), Limón (10g), Sal marina (2g)

name: Helado de chocolate vegano
ingredients: Plátano congelado (200g), Aguacate (80g), Cacao en polvo (30g), Leche de coco (50ml), Miel de agave (25g), Vainilla (3g), Nueces (20g)

name: Croquetas de calabaza y nueces

name: Salsa pesto vegana
ingredients: Albahaca fresca (50g), Piñones (30g), Aceite de oliva (40g), Ajo (10g), Levadura nutricional (20g), Sal marina (3g), Limón (15g)

name: Mayonesa sin huevo
ingredients: Leche de soja (100ml), Aceite de girasol (60g), Mostaza (10g), Limón (15g), Sal (2g), Cúrcuma (2g)

name: Queso feta vegano
ingredients: Tofu firme (200g), Aceite de oliva (30g), Vinagre de manzana (15ml), Sal marina (5g), Orégano (5g), Levadura nutricional (15g)

name: Salsa Alfredo vegana
ingredients: Anacardos remojados (80g), Leche de almendras (100ml), Ajo (10g), Levadura nutricional (20g), Sal marina (3g), Nuez moscada (2g), Aceite de oliva (15g)

name: Crema agria fermentada vegana
ingredients: Anacardos (100g), Agua (80ml), Probiótico en polvo (5g), Limón (10g), Sal marina (3g)
